The Gentoo Linux FAQ answers Gentoo Linux frequently-asked questions.
» English| Français| Español| German

The Gentoo Linux CD Installation Guide explains how to install Gentoo Linux/x86 using our installation CD.
» English| Français| Español| German(for Gentoo v1.2)

The Gentoo Linux PowerPC Installation Guide explains how to install Gentoo Linux/PPC.
» English

The Gentoo Linux PowerPC FAQ asks (and answers) frequently asked questions about installing and running Gentoo Linux on the PowerPC platform.
» English

The Gentoo Linux/PPC QuickStart Guide is a reference on setting up Gentoo Linux/PPC. However it is out-of-date and should no longer be used. Please follow the Gentoo Linux PowerPC Installation Guide (above) instead.
» English| Español

The Gentoo SPARC Installation guide explains how to install Gentoo Linux/SPARC.
» English|

The Portage User Guide explains how to start using our ports system called Portage.
» English| Français| Español| German

The Portage Manual aims to be a comprehensive manual for Portage.
» English| Français| Español| German

The Gentoo Linux rc-script Guide explains how our system startup and service management scripts work.
» English| Français| German

The Desktop Configuration Guide shows you how to set up a fully-functional desktop system after installation.
» English| Français| Español

The ALSA Configuration Guide is a comprehensive guide on how to install and use ALSA (Advanced Linux Sound Architecture).
» English

The USE Variable HOWTO explains what all those interesting USE variables do.
» English| Français| Español| German

The ENV.D HOWTO explains what /etc/env.d is and how to use it.
» English

The PPPoE Guide explains how to setup and use a PPPoE connection for use during a Gentoo installation.
» English|

The Gentoo Security Guide shows you how to harden your Gentoo Linux system against intruders and attacks.
» English| Français| Español

The Gentoo Java Guide explains how Java is handled under Gentoo Linux.
» English| Français| German

The Nano Basics Guide shows you some basic Nano commands, to get you up and running fast.
» English| Français| Español| German

The Gentoo Alternative Installation Guide shows you how to install Gentoo Linux/x86 using various alternative methods.
» English| Français| Español| German

The OpenAFS Guide guides you through the process of getting OpenAFS configured on your system. OpenAFS is a distributed network-based file sharing technology.
» English

The Gentoo Guide to Printing A guide to using CUPS on your gentoo system (covers printing with gimp, abiword and openoffice).
» English

The Gentoo nVidia Guide Troubleshooting the nVidia driver under Gentoo.
» English| Français

The Localisation Guide Howto localise gentoo for your language.
» German

The Developers HOWTO gives you the information you need to get started creating your own ports (ebuilds).
» English| Français

The CVS tutorial will be of assistance if you are new to CVS, the concurrent versions system.
» English| Français

The Eclass HOWTO shows you how to create ebuilds that support OOP-like inheritance features.
» English| Français

The User-Mode Linux Guide shows you how to use User-Mode Linux under Gentoo Linux.
» English

The Documentation Guide will introduce you to the XML syntax used for the creation of our Web documentation.
» English| Español

The Contributing Ebuilds Guide will show you how to use Bugzilla to submit new Gentoo Linux ebuilds that you have created.
» English| Français| Español| German
